packagegui.title: DNS Server: Settings

field.description: Bind TinyDNS to this IP address. This is the IP that will service DNS requests for this server. This IP cannot be used as a DNS server on client machines. Bind to 127.0.0.1 and use Port Forward entries to redirect DNS traffic internal or external to this resolver from multiple IPs.
Enable DNScache caching recursive resolver. Registers LAN's SOA, NS, A, and PTR Records with TinyDNS Server.

IP Addresses allowed to query against dnscache. Leave blank to set as the IP address of the interface where dnscache is running. To answer quieries from 192.168.1.0/24 enter 192.168.1, to answer queries from 10.0.0.0/8 enter 10, Separate entries with a space, do not enter a trailing period.

field.fielddescr: Register DHCP static mappings with server
field.description: Register static DHCP leases with TinyDNS server using the Fully Qualified Domain Name specified in System: General.
Register active DHCP leases with TinyDNS server using the Fully Qualified Domain Name specified in System: General.
Wheather or not to monitor IP address
Controls polling frequency of monitoring IP address
Sync TinyDNS configuration to backup firewalls

field.fielddescr: Hosts allowed to perform DNS Zone Transfers - Note: this requires TCP port 53 firewall permit rule!

rowhelperfield.description: Enter the IP Address that is allowed to transfer zone records (ex: 4.2.2.1)

rowhelperfield.fielddescr: DNS Zone - Use * for all Zones
rowhelperfield.description: Enter the DNS zone that this IP address is allowed to transfer (ex: domain.com)
